text: Ibrahim Abouleish (23 March 1937 â€“ 15 June 2017) was an Egyptian pharmacologist. He was born in Mashtul, Egypt. In 1977 he returned to Egypt and founded the comprehensive development initiative SEKEM. The organization focuses on biodynamic farming methods in Egypt. Abouleish died on 15 June 2017 in Cairo, Egypt at the age of 80. ==Related pages== *List of Egyptian scientists ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography on Right Livelihood Award website * blog about a german TV documentary Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Egyptian businesspeople Category:Chemists Category:Egyptian scientists Category:Pharmacologists
title: Ibrahim Abouleish
